thread.section_title: Rome Glam Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful hotel
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel - Review of Rome Glam Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Talia G
title: Wonderful hotel
text:
The hotel was excellent, extremely clean and the staff were all so helpful and polite
The breakfast was 1st class with lots of options which ranged from fruit, various pastries and typical full English breakfast
The roof terrace was extremely comfortable and provided an excellent view over the city
The location of the hotel is also very central with a short 5 to 10 minute walk to the Trevi fountain
